author: craigmcc
msg: Modify build processes to include the new commons packages dependencies.
No sources have been changed to depend on them yet.

author: dwinterfeldt
msg: The message tag iterates through messages.  It can be used with ActionErrors.

author: dwinterfeldt
msg: Added ActionMessage and ActionMessages.  These work the same as the ActionError and ActionErrors classes, but are for general messaging.  ActionError and ActionErrors now subclass these new classes.

author: dwinterfeldt
msg: Added a constant for storing a message in scope and a save method for putting ActionMessages into scope.
